text:
Henry Chapier (14 November 1933 – 27 January 2019) was a French journalist, movie critic, television presenter and movie director. He was born in Bucharest, Romania. He later became a stringer at "L'Express". He worked for France 3 from 1987 to 1994.
Chapier died on 27 January 2019 at the age of 85.
